name: Mission Demolition (Sage)
description:
Title: Mission Demolition

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Puzzle

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Armed with a catapult and several projectiles, you must launch the metal balls over to the castle in order to get within the green goal zone. Pull back the slingshot and fire to learn the games physics and gravity, and try to get the balls to impact the gray castle walls and knock them over to get to the goal.

Instructions: Pull back the catapult and launch it to knock over the castle pieces. Get the ball in the green zone in order to pass to the next level

Game Design Team – Sage
